entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 09 at 7:32AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PERIODS OF RAIN FOR THE IDAHO PANHANDLE AND BLUE MOUNTAINS OF SOUTHEAST WASHINGTON TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY... Several rounds of rain will cause rises on creeks and streams across the Idaho Panhandle and the Blue Mountains through the weekend and into Monday. entry.summary: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED TODAY... entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 09 at 6:14AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOW MELT WILL RESULT IN RISES ON RIVERS AND SMALL STREAMS IN THE CASCADES TONIGHT AND INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... One to two inches of rain are expected over the Cascade Crest today and tonight. Creeks and streams will rise in response to the runoff from rain and mountain snow melt.
